TextLibrary.Text: Queen Gwendholyn
As if it were not enough that Undead are overrunning our lands, now Orcs are beginning to travel over the Hammer Pass.
As if it were not enough that Undead are overrunning our lands, now Orcs are beginning to travel over the Hammer Pass.
As if it were not enough that Undead are overrunning our lands, now Orcs are beginning to travel over the Hammer Pass.
As if it were not enough that Undead are overrunning our lands, now Orcs are beginning to travel over the Hammer Pass.
We will do what we can, your Majesty. We'll meet the Orc force and repel them.
We will do what we can, your Majesty. We'll meet the Orc force and repel them.
We will do what we can, your Majesty. We'll meet the Orc force and repel them.
We will do what we can, your Majesty. We'll meet the Orc force and repel them.
It is too late to repel them, I'm afraid. They have already attacked a village, taken many prisoners, and headed back with them towards the pass.
It is too late to repel them, I'm afraid. They have already attacked a village, taken many prisoners, and headed back with them towards the pass.
It is too late to repel them, I'm afraid. They have already attacked a village, taken many prisoners, and headed back with them towards the pass.
It is too late to repel them, I'm afraid. They have already attacked a village, taken many prisoners, and headed back with them towards the pass.

That's VERY strange. Orcs do not normally take prisoners - they simply burn and kill anything in their path. But there might still be time. Traveling with the prisoners will slow them down. If we leave now, we can overtake them before they make it back to Kor.

Then go at once! And good luck!
Then go at once! And good luck!
